name: Chimeira Meinhest
description:
In the castle of Meinhest, chimeiras show up and attack everywhere... Raise and slain all of them, and try to restore the peace in the world of Asmoran ! 

Chimeira is a metroidvania with elements of RPG, and dark souls inspired elements.

--------------///COMMANDS///-----------------

-Attack: mouse left click

-Dash: left shift

-Jump and double jump: space

-Bind spell: long push A or E

-Use spell: A or E

-Spawn a minotaur: M

-Reset Game: R

--------------///FEATURES///-----------------

-Sphere grid progression system

-Runes spells learnable killing ennemies

-Intense fighting with dashes and combos

-Die and retry

-NPC quests and dialogs

-Scenario impacting choices

-Bestiairy

-Multi language
